title: Interval Plot
response: Y variable, specify a numeric variable
Fixed: X variable - Specify one or more grouping (category) variable(s)
confidenceInterval: Specify a confidence interval value between 0 and 1 e.g. 0.95
showIntervalValuesChk: Show mean and interval values on the plot
showGroupValuesonXaxisChk: Show group values on the x axis
supressIntervalsChk: Show interval bars on the plot
priintStatTableChk: Print table with mean and interval values
facet_xChk: Segment the plot using the first group
jitterPointsChk: Spread (jitter effect) the overlapping/crowded points for a group
groupColorLegendChk: Show color legend per group combination
labelColor1: Choose a color for the scatter point
labelColor2: Choose a color for the interval bar
angleXaxis_text: Angle to slant x-axis text values (default 0 for no slanting)
angleYaxis_text: Angle to slant y-axis text values (default 0 for no slanting)
yIntercept: Enter comma separated Y intercept value(s) for the horizontal lines, e.g. 100, 200, 300
hLineColor: Select a color for line(s) and label(s)  (After color selection, click outside the control to apply)
horizontalLinelabel: Specify comma separated labels (no enclosing quotes) for the horizontal line(s)
horizontalLinelabel_angle_text: Angle to slant horizontal line label text (default 0 for no slanting)
label2: Note: Greater values move the text lower, smaller values move the text higher
label5: Specify a range for Y axis values
rangeYValues: Specify the Y axis range, for e.g. 0,100
labelHori_HorizontalJustification: Note: greater values place the text to the left, smaller values move the text to the right
verticalJustification: Control the vertical justification of the label
hori_HorizontalJustification: Control the horizontal justification of the label
addlLabelHlineTextPositionOffset: Additional adjustments to position the label text for horizontal lines
horiMovementHReflineLabel: Move text horzontally left or right - use any number with + or - sign
nobreaklineHRefLabelandValueChk: Check this box to remove the break line between label value and label text
vertiMovementHReflineLabel: Move text vertically up or down - use any number with + or - sign

help.title: Interval Plot
help.body:
Description
Creates a scatter plot, allows you to group points by one or more category (factor) variables You can Optionally add or remove Intervals on the plot (mean and interval bounds of the mean per group) You can Optionally add or remove a table showing the mean and interval bounds of the mean per group You can add multiple horizontal reference lines with respective labels per reference line
